cleaned_text: Faculty by Research Keyword Find collaborators and partners in your field of research at Yale School of Medicine. These keywords are selected from the [NIH's MESH keyword list](https://meshb.nlm.nih.gov/search), and faculty choose their own. The lists may not display all faculty who work in that area--there are instructions for how to add faculty member to a keyword at the bottom of this page. Search [More Options](/search/?entityType=Profile) A B C D E F G H I K L M N O P R S T U V W How to Add a Faculty Member to a Keyword This keyword listing is managed by the faculty themselves through the [News & People Profile system](https://prod.admin.profile.yale.edu/). If you wish to add yourself to a specific research topic, follow the steps below: - Visit [https://prod.admin.profile.yale.edu/](https://prod.admin.profile.yale.edu/)and search for the faculty member's name. (Skip to the last sentence if you do not have access to a faculty member's profile.) - Select the "Research" tab on the faculty member's profile, and scroll down to the topic "Research Interests - Medicine" - Click "Add New" and either begin typing into the Search bar or select from the keyword topic tree. - You may add as many keywords as you like. If you do not have access to a faculty profile to update their keyword listing, please email [ysm.editor@yale.edu](mailto:ysm.editor@yale.edu) with your suggested addition.
